game_description: Use special abilities to destroy the targets! Use tricky shots to clear all stages as fast as possible!
review_1: Don’t hesitate. It’s free. Download the game right now! This game shocked me. I found myself enjoying this game much more than I thought I would. The only thing this game needs is an endless mode, modifiers, and more power-ups to give it some more replayability. Right now it’s pretty short, but so worth your time!
